Slutty Life by Satsuki Imonet is a soon-to-be fan favorite that revels in beautiful women of all walks of life. Whether you're into titillating tutors, curvy milfs, a crush next door or a mysterious woman up for a one-night stand, Slutty Life leaves nothing to the imagination. Featuring eight lively chapters, these women know how to make a guy have a long, fulfilled life.
